questions_and_notes: This should have a root name more consistent with rsutcsbnd-E3hrPt, rsutcsafbnd-E3hrPt, rsucsbnd-E3hrPt, and rsucsafbnd-E3hrPt.  cell_methods should include area: mean
specific_issues: 8:Deprecate? Only 3 groups contributed this variable in CMIP6.

comment: Solar irradiance at a horizontal surface at top of atmosphere.
